thread.section_title: McDonalds Monopoly: What prizes are on offer and what are rare stickers? – Metro
thread.title: McDonalds Monopoly: What prizes are on offer and what are rare stickers?
thread.title_full: McDonalds Monopoly: What prizes are on offer and what are rare stickers?

author: imigroome3
title: McDonalds Monopoly: What prizes are on offer and what are rare stickers?
text:
(Picture: Metro / McDonalds) McDonalds Monopoly launched today, and the promotion is offering a whole host of prizes. 
The game will run between 22 March and 2 May, giving customers six weeks of chances to win whenever they make a purchase. 
This year, Mini Coopers, holidays, cash prizes and millions of instant food wins are on offer to those who buy stickered items in-store. 
Those who collect 10 property stickers of any kind can also bag themselves a Now TV pass for free. 
How does McDonalds Monopoly work? (Picture: PA) Customers can play the game by peeling back the packaging to remove a Game Piece. 
Some prizes are ‘Instant Win’, with thousands of these available – or you can collect pieces to win a bigger prize, by completing property sets on one of the McDonald’s ‘game boards’. 
Each Game Piece will have either two stickers (a Double Game Piece) or three stickers (a Triple Game Piece). 
Mother who lost baby during pregnacy told he never existed The bigger the McDonald’s meal, the more chance you have of gaining a reward. 
One of the stickers will always be an Online Sticker – which will include a nine-character code that can be entered online for a chance to win an Online Game Prize. 
The other sticker on any Double Game Piece will either be a Property Set or an Instant Win. 
The other stickers on a Triple Game Piece will be from a Property Set, and one might be an Instant Win. 
What are the Instant Win prizes? You could win a Mini Cooper (Picture: Getty) There are plenty on offer this year, and they include:
£25,000 cash Mini Cooper PlayStation 4 NOW TV Box + 1 year pass Pair of cinema tickets £30 boohoo.com voucher Best Western hotel break Snapfish photo book For the full list, check the official website .
More: UK MP films panic as gunshots are fired during London terror attack 
Police appeal for photos and video of Parliament terror attack 
Four dead including police officer and attacker following London terror attack 
What are rare prizes? (Picture: Getty) Those lucky enough to receive a rare Online Win sticker can receive subscriptions or cash prizes.
Rare online wins include:
3-month Deezer Premium + Subscription – 2000 available £20 CeX voucher – 2500 available Those who collect rare property sets can also win big – here are some of the prizes you could bag if you’re lucky:
Mayfair + Park Lane – £100, 000 cash – 4 available Bond Street + Oxford Street + Regent Street – Mini Cooper – 15 to be won Vine Street + Marlborough Street + Bow Street – £250 Red Letter Days Experience – 800 available Piccadilly + Coventry Street + Leicester Square – £1500 to spend on a holiday from Airtours – 140 available MORE: McDonalds Monopoly is back: can you get free game stickers?
